articles.title: Mass. man whose dog died in fireworks explosion to face charges
articles.description:
Kevin Ruiz, 54, of Dartmouth, will face multiple charges after a dog died in a house explosion on Sept. 2.

The post Mass. man whose dog died in fireworks explosion to face charges appeared first on Boston.com.

articles.title: 2 separate kitten incidents prompt warning for drivers to check under the hood
articles.description:
The baby kittens, named Sparky and Pisces, were recently found seeking warmth under the hoods of cars located in Taunton and Brockton.

The post 2 separate kitten incidents prompt warning for drivers to check under the hood appeared first on Boston.com.
